title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about golden bracelets by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about golden bracelets: It is one of the happy dreams, especially for women, as it is considered a well-known adornment, as it is made of one of the precious metals, but in the world of dreams its connotations vary between good and bad, and it is not necessarily a vision worthy of praise, as it is indeed for lovers of gold, and that the difference It is due to some things, the most important of which are the marital status and the events of the dream. Interpretation of a dream about golden bracelets: A wife who sees a golden bracelet falling from her hand is considered a dream that indicates staying away from something expensive and valuable to her and that she does not want to lose. The bracelet in the wife’s dream symbolizes the occurrence of many disturbances and transformations. In the life of the dreamer and that he lives in a state of instability and chaos. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a delicate and beautiful bracelet, this is a sign that a righteous man will soon propose to her. Wearing a bracelet in a woman’s dream symbolizes her commitment to worship and obedience, and golden bracelets in The dream means a new job opportunity for the fortuneteller, a good sign for the abundance of food, and an indication of the large amount of money he had. You will receive. When a ruler sees in his dream that he is wearing a gold bracelet, this is evidence that he is an honest person who rules justly among people. Interpretation of a dream about golden bracelets by Ibn Sirin. A wife who sees in her dream that she has many gold bracelets is considered a dream that symbolizes falling into many misfortunes. And misfortunes. Losing gold bracelets in a dream symbolizes a financial crisis that will happen to the pioneer or that he will face problems at work, and a woman wearing a beautiful golden bracelet in a dream is one of the dreams that symbolizes salvation from any worries and sadness in which the dreamer lives. Who lives in distress and troubles. If he sees in his dream that he is buying gold bracelets, then this is a sign of salvation from these things and an indication of relief from distress and the coming of relief. Interpretation of a dream about gold bracelets by Al-Osaimi: Wearing bracelets in a dream is considered a good sign that promises its owner many good things and blessings that he will enjoy in the coming period. The poor dreamer, when he sees in his dream that he is buying gold bracelets, is a sign of extreme poverty, and the accumulation of many debts on him. A young man buying gold bracelets in his dream symbolizes obtaining a better job opportunity or earning a lot of money from the current job. Watching Al-Osaimi’s gold bracelets. Praiseworthy indicates the achievement of goals and achieving goals. Dream interpretation of golden bracelets for single women. The older girl was wearing one golden bracelet on her hands, and her beautiful and slim figure indicates her reaching the highest positions at work. A woman who sees someone she does not know is wearing a golden bracelet of vision, which symbolizes To get to know a good man and marry him soon. Stealing a gold bracelet from an engaged girl symbolizes breaking off her engagement. Watching a famous person give a single woman a gold bracelet leads to her marriage in the near future, and God knows best. A virgin girl who buys gold bracelets in a dream...

title: Interpretation of a dead person’s gift to the living in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq

preview.html: The gift of the dead to the living in a dream: Gifts in a dream represent many happy and joyful symbols for the dreamer, but a person may feel some insecurity when he sees the dead giving him a gift, and the type of gift may differ, and interpretations differ with this difference, and we highlighted the following lines to interpret the dream of a dead gift For the living. The gift of the dead to the living in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The gift of the dead to the living in a dream. The interpretation of dreams of a dead gift to the living shows many forms of happiness and people in the world of visions. The dream is generally associated with meeting joy and goodness, because gifts symbolize events, news, and situations that cause happiness. Among the interpretations of the dream is that it shows The dreamer's ability to achieve his goals and not depend on others, but rather exerts a lot of effort in order to achieve success and not depend on failure. It can be said that the meanings of the vision come from the positive connotations where the person emerges from any financial crisis he faces with great material satisfaction as a result of the increased blessing in his money. With the gift of the deceased to the living sick person, the disease begins to disappear and the insomnia and tension that accompanied him throughout his illness disappear from his life. If a woman fears pregnancy because of the difficulty of her pregnancy and the inability of doctors to treat her, and she finds her deceased father giving her some beautiful things in her dream, then the dream can be interpreted as an urgent pregnancy with permission. God. . The gift of the dead to the living in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets giving a gift from the dead to the living as a sign of happiness and joy, and the dreamer should feel joy in this dream and not be afraid because the gift is from the dead. There are cases of the gift that he and most dream interpreters mentioned, that is, if he gives The deceased special person receives paper papers, because they are not preferred in most interpretations, because they are an indication of worries and concerns. He says that if this gift is beautiful and new clothes, it indicates the comfort and grace that the fortuneteller will experience, but if it is worn out and old, the person may bear a lot of financial burdens and debts. Which causes his poverty, God forbid. Ibn Sirin considers giving food as a gift in the world of visions to be one of the doors to relief, livelihood, and prosperity. Then the dreamer accepts the gift and eats it. As for the gift of anything that is damaged, it is not considered desirable because it alerts the person to some inconveniences and events that prevent him. From living his life normally. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. The gift of the dead to the living in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq expresses the gift of the dead to the living, saying that it is one of the sources of income for a person, Which means that his livelihood increases in his work and for this reason he attains happiness. She touches on the topic of pregnancy in the interpretation of this dream and confirms that her request for him will be fulfilled, which means that she will become pregnant after seeing her, and God will give her success and happiness in this matter. It is expected that the dreamer who is suffering from illness when he sees This subject is in good health and his illness turns into wellness or his health gradually improves. The fortune teller

title: Interpretation of seeing a dark road in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dark road in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com as if they see you walking on a dark road in the dream indicates fear, anxiety, tension, or frustration due to many pressures, so we will talk About this vision for a single girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the man, and the young man. What is the interpretation of seeing a dark road in a dream for a single girl: Seeing yourself walking in a dark street in a dream For a single girl, this indicates stress, tension, and a feeling of loneliness. Seeing a lonely girl on a dark street in a dream is a sign of her failure. In achieving the goal of her dream. Seeing a single woman because she is in a dark place, such as a home or office, indicates his extreme loneliness and his great need for love and security. Seeing in a dream alone in the dark, her presence in a strange place indicates her sadness, despair, and disappointment in her life, or indicates a serious psychological crisis. Dreaming of walking on a dark street, it shows the unknown future. See also: Interpretation of seeing a long road in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a dark road in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman on a dark road in a dream indicates problems and disagreements with her husband and her thinking of divorcing him. Seeing a married woman in a dream Darkness in her home. It mentions their extreme poverty and their efforts to improve their financial situation. A married woman sees darkness in her room in a dream. It indicates severe neglect of her husband and children. Seeing a ray of light in a dark place in a dream indicates the approach of relief, loss of worries, and sorrow for her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing Tawaf the Kaaba Or circumambulating the Kaaba in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a man walking in a dark street in a dream: Seeing a man walking in a dark street in a dream is one of the bad visions that indicate the spread of deception, corruption of morals, and straying from the teachings of religion. Seeing a simple light in a dark place in a dream is a sign of good things happening to the dreamer. It will keep him away from sadness and anxiety. Seeing light coming out of a dark place in a dream for a man, this indicates that he will achieve kindness and adequate nutrition after extreme fatigue. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dark place in a dream What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees a dark road in a dream: Seeing a pregnant woman on a dark road In a dream, it indicates the imminent new birth and her intense fear of it. Seeing a pregnant woman walking in a dark place. If she dreams of a stranger, this indicates sadness and disappointment from the people around her or excessive anxiety about the infertility process. See also: Interpretation of seeing an old workplace in a dreamWhat Interpretation of seeing a young man walking in a dark street in a dream: Seeing a young man walking in a dark street in a dream indicates anxiety and fear of the future and failure. A young man seeing a dark road in a dream indicates a feeling of loss and failure in achieving dreams or a feeling of loneliness or panic and suffocation due to many pressures. Seeing yourself driving a long, dark road in a dream says that he is thinking about cutting ties with his friends and feels tired and exhausted. Dreaming of driving a car in a dark place indicates lonely loneliness.

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying watermelon in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about buying a watermelon in a dream Each of us wants to know what dreams bring, so we learn in the following lines the interpretation of a dream about buying a watermelon in a dream according to what was transmitted by the scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about buying a watermelon in a dream Interpretation of a dream about buying a watermelon in a dream can be an indication of an invitation to attend a wedding, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the purchase of a watermelon can also express goodness and livelihood, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. If a married woman sees herself buying a watermelon in a dream, this can be evidence of goodness and livelihood, God willing. If a single girl is seen buying a watermelon, this may indicate her love of risk, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about rotten watermelon in a dream The interpretation of a dream about rotten watermelon in a dream can be a sign of trouble, and God knows best. If a married man sees a rotten melon, this may be evidence of problems with his wife, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees a rotten watermelon, this may be a sign of a problem with her fiancé, and God is Great and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees a rotten melon, this may indicate problems with her husband, and God knows best. title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing a dead sheep in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a dead sheep in a dream. Interpretation scholars believe that the dream looks good and carries a lot of news for the dreamer, but it portends bad luck in some cases. In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a dead sheep for single people, married people, pregnant women, and divorced women according to Ibn Sirin and the leading scholars of interpretation. Seeing a dead sheep in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a dead sheep in a dream indicates that the dreamer disobeys his parents and behaves badly with them, and he must change and reconcile what is between him and them until he obtains the satisfaction of God Almighty, and his mind is at peace and his conscience calms him. And in the event that the dreamer sees many sheep dying While he is sleeping, this indicates the possibility of war breaking out in the country in which he lives, which will lead to the death of many innocent people. The dream indicates that the dreamer disobeys the Lord (Glory be to Him) in many matters and falls behind in duties, and it is a warning to him to repent and return to the path of truth. The dream shows that the dreamer is a person who does not trust himself and feels lost and stressed all the time, and the dream carries a message telling him to believe in his abilities, abandon negative thinking, and think in a positive way. Seeing a dead sheep in a dream by Ibn Sirin If the dreamer sees himself offering a dead sheep to someone in his dream, this indicates However, he will have many children in the future and the Lord (Glory be to Him) will bless him with good offspring. If the dreamer sees himself slaughtering a sheep in a dream, this means that he will soon perform the Hajj. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a slaughtered sheep portends bad luck, as it indicates the approaching death. One of the dreamer’s relatives. However, if he slaughters a sheep and takes its wool in a dream, this indicates that he will soon unexpectedly obtain a large amount of money. Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing a dead sheep in a single woman’s dream: If an unmarried woman sees a slaughtered sheep in her dream, this means that she will soon marry a righteous, pious man who has good morals and loves her very much. If a girl sees a dead sheep in a dream and takes its wool, this indicates abundant livelihoods, improved economic conditions, and the emergence of Positive changes in her life in the coming period. If a woman sees in a vision a sheep chasing her, then killing it, then the dream indicates her long life, and symbolizes that God (the Almighty) will bless her with health and protect her from diseases. The dream of killing a sheep symbolizes success in practical life, and achieving A prominent position in society after fatigue and hardship, and if the dreamer is a student, then the dream indicates her success in her studies and in obtaining the highest degree, and if an unmarried woman sees a black sheep, the vision shows her self-confidence and height. Seeing a dead sheep in a dream for a married woman. If the woman sees The married woman herself buys a dead sheep, then the vision indicates that she spends all her money to meet the needs of her family, and if the color of the sheep is white and black, this indicates that God Almighty. It will give her a lot of money very soon. If the dreamer sees that her husband offers her a sheep, this means that she feels...

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing swimming in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Swimming in a dream: Seeing swimming in a person’s dream carries with it a large number of different interpretations and different connotations, some of which express kindness, good luck, and happiness, and others that carry nothing but sorrow, worries, and unpleasant news. Details about this topic in the article below. Swimming in a dreamCommentators have explained many interpretations related to seeing swimming in a dream, which are as follows: If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is swimming in the sea and is having difficulty in it, then this is a clear indication of many obstacles, crises, and suffering that prevent him from Happiness in real life. If a person sees in his dream that he is swimming in a river, then God will provide for him and expand his livelihood from where he does not know or calculate it in the near future. The interpretation of a dream about swimming in river water without impurities in the vision for a person indicates his closeness to God, his good condition, and walking according to All the teachings of the true religion, which leads to God’s satisfaction with him. Swimming in a dream by Ibn SirinThe scholar Ibn Sirin explained many interpretations and facts related to the vision of swimming in a dream, which are as follows: If the dreamer is looking for a job and sees in his dream that he is swimming in the sea, this is a clear indication of Accepting a prestigious job will earn him a lot of money and raise his standard of living. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is swimming in sea water and its color is intense blue, then this is clear evidence that God will facilitate his affairs and make it easier for him to reach his goal that he was striving for. Succeed for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a dream for a dreamer who is still studying means that he will be able to study his lessons well, pass exams with distinction, and obtain the highest certificates in the near future. If one sees in his dream that he is bathing in the sea, this is clear evidence that God will accept his repentance. He is satisfied with him and changes his circumstances for the better. Swimming in a dream for single people: Seeing an unmarried woman swimming in a dream has many interpretations, the most important of which are the following: If the fortuneteller is single and saw in her dream that she was swimming in clear sea water, this is a clear indication that she will enter into a romantic relationship. It ends with a happy marriage in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in sea water full of impurities in a dream about a virgin symbolizes the presence of a malicious and deceitful young man who pretends to have feelings for her and wants to harm her and damage her reputation, so it must be so. She is careful not to approach strangers and keeps it to herself. If a girl dreams that she drowned while swimming, this is a clear indication of a major disaster that will turn her life upside down. Swimming in a dream for a married woman. Seeing swimming in a married woman’s dream has many interpretations, the most important of which are the following: If A married woman dreams that she is swimming in a dream, this is clear evidence of the strength of the relationship between her and her partner and the stability and reassurance that fills her life with it. If the wife sees in her dream that she is swimming in polluted, unclean water, this indicates the presence of a second woman in her husband’s life. Seeing the wife swimming in Water par excellence expresses the intelligence and intelligence that you possess

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person whose clothes are torn in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the dead person's clothes torn in a dream If you want to know the interpretation of seeing the dead person's clothes torn in a dream, one of the dreams that many wanted to know the interpretation of this vision, let us learn about its interpretation from some diligent translators, and the reader must know that it is the jurisprudence of scholars that the site has nothing to do with the interpretations, but rather from diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of seeing a dead person whose clothes are torn in a dream If the deceased sees his clothes torn in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be exposed to a financial crisis for some time. If a person sees that the deceased has torn his clothes, this may indicate the suffering that the dreamer has suffered a lot in those days. A dream about a dead person whose clothes are torn in a dream may indicate bad events that the dreamer may face in his life in those days. Whoever sees in his dream that the dead person has torn his clothes, it may indicate that he has cut off kinship ties in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the dead again in a dream If a dead person is seen dying again in a dream, this may indicate bad changes that happen to the dreamer, and God knows best. The dream of the dead person died again, and there was Screaming and screaming can indicate a problem that a family member has fallen into during this time, and God knows best. If we see the death of the deceased in a dream, this may indicate a health problem that the dreamer or a member of his family may face during those days, and God knows best. If a person mourns the death of the deceased again in a dream, this may indicate a crisis that the dreamer was facing in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dead person watering crops in a dream The dream of the deceased was that he was watering plants and his appearance was beautiful, it may indicate that the owner of the vision has reached his goals and aspirations in those days. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased was watering plants may indicate good events that will come to the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased was watering plants, it may indicate the high status that the dreamer will reach in those days by the grace of God. And the dream of the deceased watering plants in a dream may indicate the good deeds that the deceased left for his family and that he helped them a lot at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the deceased in wet clothes in a dream Seeing the dead in wet clothes in a dream may indicate the need of the deceased for prayer and zakat At that time, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that the clothes of the deceased are wet with water can indicate bad events that may happen to the dreamer in his life, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing the clothes of the deceased wet in a dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer great difficulties and crises in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a paralyzed dead person in a dream If one sees a paralyzed dead person in a dream, this can be a warning sign to the dreamer about the bad deeds he is committing. It is possible that seeing a paralyzed father in a dream indicates his son’s misconduct and stops him and repents to God Almighty. A paralyzed dead person in a dream can indicate that the dreamer has been afflicted with some problems

title: Interpretation of a dream about a hammer

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a hammer in a dream: It is multiple and has different meanings that differ depending on the state of the dreamer and the dream, so some wonder if seeing a hammer in a dream is a sign of good or bad, especially since the dream conditions and circumstances are different. The dreamer’s feeling at that moment and we will explain that through the summit platform. Interpretation of seeing a hammer in a dream by Al-Osaimi Sheikh Al-Osaimi interprets seeing a hammer in a dream with different meanings, such as happiness, effort at work, and good offspring: The meaning of using a hammer in a dream is success and the achievement of the desires and goals that the viewer seeks in life. The concept of forging a hammer in everyone's dreams symbolizes the disappearance of sadness and pain, ease of situation, repayment of debts, relief of suffering and exhaustion, and healing of the sick. The meaning of a broken hammer in everyone's dream is the emergence of problems, loss of money, business problems, and disagreements between spouses. The meaning of holding a hammer in a man's dream It is to improve his financial situation, pay off his debts, and remove distress and pressure from those who see it. Interpretation of a dream about a hammer in a dream for a single woman. Al-Usaimi explained several different interpretations of a dream for a single woman, as follows: The meaning of holding a hammer in a girl’s dream indicates the pursuit of success in any field and the arrival of news. Happy. Hearing the sound of a hammer in a girl’s dream indicates a new job in which she will succeed and advance. The meaning of forging a hammer in a girl’s dream symbolizes good news, the approaching engagement and marriage of a young man with a good personality and charm for whomever she sees. The interpretation of seeing a hammer in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of She is a diligent and patient girl until she achieves her dreams and ambitions and succeeds in work and study. A dream in which an unmarried girl sees herself carrying a hammer indicates that she has received a lot of good news for her. Seeing a hammer in a dream for an unmarried girl is evidence of the availability of a new job for her, which will allow She has achieved a high status among people. Interpretation of a dream about a hammer in a dream for a married woman. Al-Osaimi pointed out that the interpretation of this dream for a married woman is different, so we ask her the following: The interpretation of a dream about a hammer in a dream for a married woman indicates her desire to feel safe and live in stability and tranquility with her family and husband. That Dreaming of a married woman who has not given birth yet being beaten with a hammer means that she will be lucky and happy with her pregnancy. The dream of buying a new hammer in the dream of a married woman indicates that she will have good offspring who will obey her parents and God. The dream of breaking a hammer in a married woman’s dream indicates that there are many problems and disagreements with Husband, which may lead to divorce. Read more: Interpretation of seeing a chicken slaughtered in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a hammer in a dream for a man Imam Al-Usaimi suggested various interpretations of this dream for men, including the following: Seeing an iron hammer in an unmarried person’s dream indicates his marriage to a girl of good morals and piety. The interpretation of a dream about an old hammer in a dream indicates nostalgia and memories of the past. Seeing a hammer in a dream means relief from anxiety and the disappearance of anxiety. The clad hammer

title: Interpretation of cocoa in a dream and seeing eating cocoa in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of cocoa shows happiness, good things and other interpretations. We will explain this to single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced men, and men, such as eating chocolate or cocoa powder, or buying dark chocolate or cocoa butter, according to Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, and others in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of cocoa in a dream. If you see cocoa in a dream, this means that you will seek to form friendships with hated people for the sake of fun and achievement. Progress on a specific topic or interest. Seeing cocoa in a dream brings a lot of goodness and happiness to the one who sees it, and jurists in dream interpretation say that it is evidence of a lot of money if the one who sees it eats it, just like seeing a face. Buying cocoa in a dream means that he will soon hear happy and cheerful news. Seeing cocoa in a dream indicates that this person has been suffering from some problems and difficulties for a long time and is constantly exposed to pressure, but after a while he will work to correct this situation, his problems will end, and he will live beautiful days. At the same time, he will recover from an illness that kept him in bed for a long time. Seeing someone eating cocoa in a dream indicates a disease that will take a little longer to treat, but in the end he will heal and return to his previous healthy and happy life. Seeing cocoa in a dream told Ibn Sirin that the connotations of cocoa in a dream It is very praiseworthy, and among the meanings of seeing cocoa in a dream, it shows happy news, it indicates abundant livelihood, it shows a new and good friend at the same time, and time indicates rest after exhaustion, and it contains good news, as it indicates engagement, and it indicates marriage, and unfortunately there is An undesirable vision that sometimes shows an engagement being broken. Distributing cocoa in a dream to a young man indicates marriage. As for distributing it to a married man, it indicates relief from worries. Regarding buying cocoa in a dream, it indicates happy news that will come your way, God willing, Blessed and Most High. Seeing a dead person eating cocoa in a dream, if this vision is for a married person, then it is hereditary, and if it is For a young man, it indicates marriage. If a married man or even a young man takes cocoa from an unmarried girl, then for the young man he will marry her and love her very much if he knows her, and if he does not know her then it is a marriage in general to the young man. As for the married man, they said that he should marry again and they said that money would come. To him is on the way, God willing, Blessed and Most High, or sustenance. As for a married woman, buying cocoa in a dream is a blessing and livelihood for her family. Eating cocoa for a married woman if she is suffering from problems at the time she sees this vision indicates the disappearance of these problems, and if they are not She suffers from problems at the time of seeing her with this vision, so there is good news and happiness in the coming days, God willing, Blessed and Most High. She gives cocoa to a married woman from her husband, as this is a sign that her husband loves her very much. As for a divorced woman, eating removes worries. Cooking cocoa for a divorced woman is a sign of happiness. Giving cocoa in a dream at a wedding is not a requirement for a divorced woman.

title: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about kings?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about kings is considered one of the unconventional visions, which many people seek to interpret to find out what brings good or bad to people in the interpretation. Controversy has arisen around it, taking into account the person who sees it. Interpretation of a dream about kings: A dream about kings in a dream shows what a prestigious position the dreamer gains on the practical level and the distinguished social position he occupies for the sake of another and far from family and homeland. Dreaming about kings in a dream and shaking hands with him is a sign of his goals. And his ambitions as he waits to reach them, and the developments that happen to him that would bring about a radical change in the course of his life. Also, visiting the sick person’s home indicates the coming of death, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about kings by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin’s dream about kings symbolizes the good companionship that this person enjoys, which pushes him to the good and the right path, and is a support for him in good times and bad. Happiness. And the dream of Ibn Sirin’s kings, if combined with fear, shows the actions carried out by this dreamer, of which he is ashamed and angers everyone around him, along with the worship and duties of seeking God’s satisfaction. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the king and sitting with him by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the king and sitting with him by Ibn Sirin indicates what distinguishes him from this. The dreamer has a leadership personality, wisdom, and the ability to control the course of things. Interpretation of a dream of kings for a single woman. A dream of kings for an unmarried woman expresses the abundance of sustenance that will come to her in the coming period. It also indicates that if the king visits her and she becomes ill, there will be a delay in her health, and God knows best. She must ask God for wellness and perhaps her appearance in the form of a queen going to her sleep, a sign in her relationship with a pious man who improves her relationship and achieves what she desires for a happy life. Kings dream of an unmarried woman, if that queen is unjust, it is considered a sign of transgression and injustice committed by him. She has someone stronger than her, so she asks God for redemption, for He is the best protector and can do that. This is also evidence of the bad things that happen in her life that create many problems for her. Seeing kings and princes in a single woman’s dream. Seeing kings and princes in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the hopes and goals that she achieves, but if she is beautiful in appearance and appearance, this is evidence of her relationship. A man with an attractive appearance is sometimes a sign of positive changes. And transformations on a practical level. Interpretation of a dream about kings for a married woman: A dream about kings for a married woman includes an indication of the blessing and favor that God will give her in the near future, and God knows best. But if he appears as a queen, this is a sign that she has achieved everything. The goal and purpose, and her marriage to a king symbolizes her good qualities and good intentions, make her respected and loved by everyone around her. Kings dream of a married woman, if she sits in her bedroom, this is evidence of what she will gain in useful knowledge, which will benefit her in this world and the hereafter, But if it appears as one of the king’s servants, this is evidence. Of the good events that come to it and skip all the annoying things the
